name: DealHijack
tag_list: deals, coupon, discount, shopping, groupon, livingsocial, tippr, dealfind, daily-deal-aggregator, aggregator, daily-deals, group-deals, group-buying, deal-of-the-day, savings, save-money
overview:
DealHijack gets you the best daily deals from every deal site like Groupon, LivingSocial, Tippr and DealFind and many others, and shows them in one place.

You can access deals on our website or through a simple daily email. We list deals from many markets across Canada and the United States.

With DealHijack, you do not have to spend your lunch break sifting through e-mails and visiting multiple deal sites. By using DealHijack, you save your time and your money because we give you access to dozens of deals at 50-90% with a simple click of your mouse.

DealHijack also lets you choose the deals you see. We allow you to customize your deal list using filters that you can change at any time. We make it easy for you to filter deals by category, price, location and more.
